text: Hontoni anata gata no omo wa arra de ara reru. Kare wa 6-nichi de ten to ji o tsukuri, sorekara gyokuza ni za shite ora reru. Kare wa hiru no ue ni yoru o owa se, yoru ni hiru o awatadashiku aitsuga shime nasa re, mata taiyo, tsuki, Murubushi o, inochi ni fukusa se rareru. A, kare koso wa sozo shi togyo sa reru okatade wanai ka. Ban'yu no shu arra ni shukufuku are
